ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dip0r.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | dip0r.5 | |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) |
| 3 |  | dip0r.7 | |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( normCV ` U ) = ( normCV ` U ) |
| 5 | 1, 4, 3 | #P_ipidsq | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( A P A ) = ( ( ( normCV ` U ) ` A ) ^ 2 ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( A P A ) = 0 <-> ( ( ( normCV ` U ) ` A ) ^ 2 ) = 0 ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 4 | #P_nvcl | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( normCV ` U ) ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( normCV ` U ) ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 9 |  | #P_sqeq0 | |- ( ( ( normCV ` U ) ` A ) e. CC -> ( ( ( ( normCV ` U ) ` A ) ^ 2 ) = 0 <-> ( ( normCV ` U ) ` A ) = 0 ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( ( ( normCV ` U ) ` A ) ^ 2 ) = 0 <-> ( ( normCV ` U ) ` A ) = 0 ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 4 | #P_nvz | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( ( normCV ` U ) ` A ) = 0 <-> A = Z ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 10, 11 | #P_3bitrd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( A P A ) = 0 <-> A = Z ) ) |
